Many major dams of the post-1950 period are now in the last stages of their originally intended lifespan

title: What is Usain Bolt’s net worth in 2025
description: Usain Bolt's estimated net worth is $90 million in 2025. This reflects his athletic achievements and business ventures. Endorsements from Puma, Visa, and Gatorade contribute to his wealth. Bolt co-founded Bolt Mobility and expanded his restaurant chain. He faced financial challenges in 2023. Bolt enjoys family life in Kingston. His journey shows speed and resilience create lasting influence.

title: Destiny claims Elon Musk and other conservatives got him banned from Twitch
description: Political streamer Destiny, Steven Bonnell II, faces a Twitch ban he attributes to a coordinated effort by Elon Musk and conservatives, alleging it's free speech issues following controversial comments on Charlie Kirk. Destiny claims his income is eliminated due to the ban, triggered by 'Hateful Conduct' accusations related to discrimination.

title: 'I think we are doing well': Google CEO on Microsoft, Meta employee poaching
description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai addressed concerns about AI talent poaching from Google DeepMind amidst rising competition from Microsoft, Meta, and OpenAI. Despite high-profile departures and increasing costs to stay competitive, Pichai remains confident in Google's retention metrics and the influx of new talent.

title: Report: Taylor Swift distressed by Kelce’s reaction to Chiefs loss
description: Taylor Swift is reportedly concerned about the intense public scrutiny affecting her fiancé, Travis Kelce. During a recent NFL game, Kelce's on-field frustration became headline news after he dropped a crucial pass. Sources reveal that the pressure of being linked to Swift has magnified every move Kelce makes, leading to unprecedented levels of attention.

title: 'Right place, right time’: Zerodha’s CEO draws parallel with Nvidia's Jensen Huang
description: Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath drew parallels between his firm's journey and Nvidia's success, emphasizing the significance of timing and perseverance. Starting with a modest ₹10 lakh investment, Zerodha leveraged free infrastructure and a customer-centric approach.

title: What amount of alcohol consumption is ok, as per top doctor
description: According to Dr Limaye, the human body transforms alcohol into dangerous substances through its breakdown process, which produces acetaldehyde as a toxic byproduct. Acetaldehyde creates DNA damage, while disrupting cell operations in the body. The disrupted cellular processes from alcohol consumption create higher cancer risks, because the body loses its ability to fight abnormal cells
